SecondReadModeXpath: function getQZImgList(){     var key = "123456781234567G";     var iv = "ABCDEF1G34123412";     var isgbk = "0";      eval(html.match(/var chapterImages.*chapterPath = "([^"]*?)";/)[0]);      var decryptedStr= Jaes(chapterImages,key,iv,isgbk);      Jlogd(decryptedStr);     var list = JSON.parse(decryptedStr.toString());     var piclist = [];     var host = "https://mhcdn.manhuazj.com/";     for (var i=0; i<list.length; i++) {         if (list[i].search(/^https?:\/\/(images.dmzj.com|imgsmall.dmzj.com)/i)==0) {             piclist[i] = "http://222.186.43.94/showImage.php?url="+list[i];         }         else if (list[i].search(/^[a-z]\//i)==0) {             piclist[i] = "http://222.186.43.94/showImage.php?url=https://images.dmzj.com/"+list[i];         }             else if (list[i].search(/^(http:|https:|ftp:|^)\/\//i)==0) {             piclist[i] = list[i];         }             else {             piclist[i] = host+chapterPath+list[i];         }     }          return piclist;  }
